Description: Fantastic renovated 2 bed, 1 bath, 1st floor through in Dorchester s hottest neighborhood of Savin Hill and is just down the street from the Savin Hill Red line subway T stop. Features an open kitchen/dining/living floor plan, laundry in building, good size bedrooms. The kitchen has beautiful cabinets, granite countertop, new appliances. Easy access to I-93, Carson Beach, the Polish Triangle, South Bay Shoppings, red line subway, Star Market supermarket, and Dorchester s best restaurants, shops, and cafes.
